ConnectionStrings.0_comment__: First we have to create a connection in Azure Data Studio
ConnectionStrings.1_comment__: Server: the name of the server of above connection
ConnectionStrings.2_comment__: Database: the database name will be generated
ConnectionStrings.3_comment__: User Id: the username to login that connection
ConnectionStrings.4_comment__: Password: the password to login that connection
ConnectionStrings.5_comment__: TrustServerCertificate: prevent an error occurs during the pre-login handshake when we `dotnet ef database update`
